pages.text: All recipes for Minebound are compatible with JEI and can be found there. To access our new recipes you'll need a Crafting bench, Armor Forge, and Alloy Furnace. The progression of our crafting goes from Energized Iron -> Illuminant Steel -> Gilded Diamond -> Myrial Diamond -> Myrial Effigy -> Myrial Suit -> Myrial Synergy -> Myrial Singularity
You can find more information in terms of crafting at our Wiki
